mapper.update: update member_discount_rules set status=2 where deleted = 0 and exprice_time < now()
mapper.select: select pay_money, gift_money from member_discount_rules where deleted = 0 and store_id = #{storeId} and status = 1 and exprice_time > now() order by pay_money asc
select concat('充值', pay_money, '元,赠送', gift_money, '元！') from member_discount_rules where deleted = 0 and status = 1 and exprice_time > now() and store_id = #{storeId} order by pay_money asc
select gift_money from member_discount_rules where deleted = 0 and status = 1 and store_id = #{storeId} and exprice_time > now() and pay_money <= #{payMoney} order by pay_money desc limit 1
